known_issues: Admin panel missing after Version 29 deployment

existing_features.title: Restore the admin panel link in the header navigation that was removed or hidden in Version 29. The link should be visible to authenticated users with admin privileges and navigate to '/admin'.
Ensure the admin role checking logic is functioning correctly and properly identifies users with admin privileges based on their Internet Identity principal.

new_feature_requests.summary: Verify that the /admin route is properly configured and accessible in the router configuration, ensuring it renders the AdminPanel page component.
